comments.raw_text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1) AppleWebKit/534.24 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/11.0.696.65 Safari/534.24
Build Identifier: 3.1.10

Print selection of html emails appears okay, but print selection of plain-text-only emails is stripped of line feeds and carriage returns.

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1.open a plain-text-only email
2.select part of the body
3.click print or print preview

Actual Results:  
print selection becomes a single paragraph.

Expected Results:  
line feeds and carriage returns should be kept.
comments.creator: adomputer@gmail.com
